summary: Add a new armour set crafted with Ice dragon scales
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/3096532-1336402066.jpg[/img]

This mod aims to change the plain old Dragon slaying rewards slightly. A Ice dragon should not have exactly the same as a fire dragon... Instead a Ice dragon will have Ice scales that you can collect to make Ice Dragon armour set.

The Ice Dragon armour set will increase your resistances to frost attacks.

Update 2.0!

- Fix the name of the helmet
- Fix helmet texture & Mesh
- Able to upgrade the armour

Update 3.0!

- Adds Dragonplate ( Heavy ) version
- New Dragon bones
- New shield
- Upgrade and craftable

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/16583-1-1336413496.jpg[/img]

----------------------------------------------------------

Best when used in conjunction with Flame Dragon armour set

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16690
author: Misa Jackson

files.changelogHtml:
Fix helmet texture & Mesh
